To open, you\'ll need to install and use Google Chrome as your default browser. Install Google Chrome To send money, you\'ll need to install and use Google Chrome as your default browser. PayPal Business requires Google Chrome for this feature.
Caution Unable to load your information Looks like something went wrong on our end. New! %1$s Checkmark
Got a suggestion or feedback? Let us know. Enter your ten digit phone number. We\'re collecting feedback on our app, if you have a few minutes we would love to talk with you on the phone. Unable to load details. Swipe down to try again.
Error getting details. Tap to retry. Login Failed Missing Required Fields Unexpected Error Go To Settings How would you rate your experience using the app so far? Build Number: %1$s Version Number: %1$s
Ready to send invoices, track your customers and manage your money on the go? Send invoices and get paid on the go Connect with your customers With all your customer contacts at your fingertips it’s never been easier to view transactions, send invoices or contact a customer when you’re on the go. Log In Manage your money from anywhere Track your account activity Stay on top of your business by viewing your account activity when you’re away from the office. Create and send invoices anywhere you work so your customers can pay in just a few clicks. Keep track of unpaid invoices and contact customers when they need a reminder. Sorry, the app does not yet support your account’s location. Please check back later Sorry, the app does not yet support secondary users. Please check back later Transfer funds to your bank, issue customer refunds and send money, in just a few clicks. Swipe to learn how
Do more with PayPal Transfer money instantly to an eligible debit card for a small fee within 30 minutes Try Instant Transfer to your bank using a debit card Apply for a PayPal Working Capital affordable business loan and pay as you grow Use PayPal balance in-store with the PayPal Business Debit Mastercard\u00AE

Login and Security Remember Me Change your PIN Confirm your email address to create and send invoices. Touch ID Version: %1$s Business Personal Fingerprint Premier Account Info Account holder Log out License Agreement State Licenses See your photo, payment preferences, saved offers, and more before you log in. (Not recommended if you share your device) Use Your PIN Next time, log in faster using your PIN. All Touch ID fingerprints stored on this device can be used to log into your PayPal account. Touch ID & PIN will also be disabled Turning off Remember Me will also unlink your Touch ID and disable your pin. All of the fingerprints stored on this device can be used to log into your PayPal account. Customer Info Shipping address History Send SMS All your customers who pay with PayPal are now in one place, right at your fingertips.
Shipped to Ready to ship to Shipping & Handling READY TO SHIP READY TO PACK Ready to pack ADD TRACKING Add Tracking SHIPPED Shipped Received on Packed on Last status view Shipping Shipping %1$s items Update tracking Tracking Number Carrier Select a Carrier Scan Tracking Label Add Tracking Number Manually Order Status Add Shipping Info Enter tracking number and carrier name Enter tracking number for your package Select the name of the delivery service or carrier NEW! PACK AND SHIP Pack, ship and track your orders from the PayPal Business App Shipping Pick and pack orders Review orders and pick items for packing directly from the app Tracking your orders got easier Just scan or enter tracking numbers to your orders Track and manage shipped orders Follow your orders, know when they are delivered or delayed Get Started I don\'t use shipping Pack Your Order Order details Shipping to Actions Scan tracking label Add tracking number Mark as shipped There are no orders ready to ship There are no orders that need tracking information There are no shipped orders Orders that have been packed for shipment that need tracking information will be listed here. Tap on the order to scan or enter a tracking number. Orders that are ready to ship will be listed here. You can add tracking information to your orders. Orders that have been shipped will be listed here. You\'ll see the order is on its way and when it has been delivered. Ready to ship Tracking number is invalid. Check and try again
Place barcode within the window to scan. Barcode not detected
General Updates
Invoice paid Request money Your invoices are paid Someone requests money from you You send money to someone You receive money from someone You purchase something
Notifications We\'ll notify you when… Push notifications for PayPal Business app are turned off. Go to Settings, turn them on, then reopen your PayPal Business app. Push notifications for PayPal Business app are enabled. To disable them, go to Settings, turn them off, and then reopen your PayPal Business app. Open Settings NEW!
